document.full_text: a woman who claimed a stranger doused her with acid, only to later admit she injured herself was sentenced on friday to pay a $500 fine and seek mental health treatment after pleading guilty to making a false statement to authorities.
document.title: washington woman fined $500 over acid attack claim
lines_and_colors: a woman who claimed a stranger doused her with acid, only to later admit she injured herself was sentenced on friday to pay a $500 fine and seek mental health treatment after pleading guilty to making a false statement to authorities.
